name: Scanner Bor
description: A Powerful Scanner for Telegram group management bots.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

SUDO_USERS.description: Users who can use scan cmds.

GBAN_CHATS.description: Chats where you store bots and the assitant will broadcast the gban cmd.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where your users will go to request for scan.
